articles.title: OpenAI unveils GPT‑5: a major step up in reasoning, coding and multimodal AI
articles.summary: OpenAI announced GPT‑5, describing significant gains in complex reasoning, coding, math and multimodal perception. The company frames GPT‑5 as a unified system that adjusts how “fast” or “deliberate” it thinks, with improved reliability across enterprise and consumer use cases.

articles.title: Google clarifies Gemini usage limits across free, Pro and Ultra tiers
articles.summary: Google published detailed daily caps for Gemini: free accounts get limited prompts with Gemini 2.5 Pro and image generation, while AI Pro and Ultra subscriptions raise both prompt and image limits substantially. It’s the clearest breakdown of Gemini access so far.

articles.title: Despite pressure, Chinese firms still seek Nvidia chips
articles.summary: Reuters reports many Chinese companies continue pursuing Nvidia accelerators despite government pressure, underscoring ongoing demand for high‑end AI hardware and the global complexity of chip supply and policy.

articles.title: NFL is back: Chargers beat Chiefs 27–21 in Brazil season opener
articles.summary: Justin Herbert threw for 318 yards and 3 TDs as the Chargers edged the Chiefs 27–21 in São Paulo. Coverage notes the late first‑down scramble that sealed it and the international fanfare around the matchup.

articles.title: Week 1 continues today — full slate and TV listings
articles.summary: Week 1 features a packed Sunday slate across the early and late windows and a primetime cap, with streaming and broadcast options by region.

articles.title: Track Worlds start Sep 13 in Tokyo — Melissa Jefferson‑Wooden enters as 100m favorite
articles.summary: The World Athletics Championships run Sep 13–21 in Tokyo. After a 10.65 at US nationals and more Diamond League wins, Melissa Jefferson‑Wooden is widely tipped in the women’s 100m. USATF has named her to the Worlds roster.

articles.title: CDC: Everyone 6 months+ should get a 2025‑26 flu shot, ideally in September–October
articles.summary: CDC published its seasonal guidance for 2025–26: annual vaccination is recommended for nearly all people 6 months and older. ACIP notes September or October is an ideal window for most groups.

articles.title: AHA/ACC issue first new blood pressure guideline since 2017
articles.summary: The 2025 hypertension guideline emphasizes prevention and earlier, personalized treatment, introduces the PREVENT risk calculator, and reinforces lifestyle therapy as first‑line care, with clear treatment targets and standardized measurement protocols.

articles.title: 1,700‑pound horse rescued from muddy field by firefighters
articles.summary: In Britain, firefighters helped free a 1,700‑pound Belgian draft horse after it sank into mud behind an electric fence — the latest animal rescue to capture the internet’s heart.

articles.title: What’s new at Moe Community Cloud
articles.summary: Coming up: expanded MCC Sports AI Suite (Pick‑6 PrizePicks‑style, MLB focus), new AI image studio, and a revamped newsletter hub. Join the community to test early features and get monetization guides.
